panels.description: Remaining cooldown time before circuit breaker allows retry
panels.title: Cooldown Remaining

targets.expr: sum by (provider) (rate(llm_requests_total{outcome="success", provider=~"$provider", agent=~"$agent"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (provider) (rate(llm_requests_total{provider=~"$provider", agent=~"$agent"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
topk(20, sum by (provider, agent, error_type, severity, status_code) (increase(llm_errors_total{provider=~"$provider", agent=~"$agent"}[$__range])))

panels.title: Probe Details by Provider & API Key
